title: Ticket #2737: Inform ticket creators about notify list
description: It is a little confusing to users that they do not get notification on tickets they create. On one hand, it is nice to be able to create tickets that one is not necessarily interested in. The "Create a New Ticket" page should have a message indicating that the creator of a ticket needs to be on the Notify list if she wants to receive notification and is not also the "assigned to" person for the ticket.
